PCOMM            PID    PPID   RET ARGS
bash             1234   1000     0 /bin/bash
ls               1235   1234     0 /bin/ls -la /tmp
grep             1236   1234     0 /bin/grep pattern file.txt
python3          1237   1000     0 /usr/bin/python3 script.py
curl             1238   1234     0 /usr/bin/curl -s http://localhost:8080
